author: @chaddombrowski9587
text: In case anyone receives a 500 Internal Server Error here, this is what I did: - Notepad++ was defaulting to ANSI. - This caused an issue with the * in the HTML: - I changed Encoding to UTF-8, saw the error and corrected it. - Refreshed the page, everything loads.

author: @swiffty1
text: What happens if you have another template lets say "gallery.html". How do you tell the HTML index page that you want that gallery page and how does it know where to place it within the document? I noticed there was only one {{ block body }} {{ endblock }} "tag" in the "header.html"  file. So if you had many {{ block body }} {{ endblock }} "tags" how would the "header.html" page know the order in which to apply the templates?
